segments.text: Mary , my friend recommend me for a job to work in a company , and I feel it's great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Are you familiar with that company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He has introduced the company details to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What does the company mainly do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The company deals in selling electronics .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When was the company founded ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was founded in 2002 , has been in business for 10 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many employees are there in total in the company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: More than 2000 now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What education background do the employees usually have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The company deals in selling electronics .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When was the company founded ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was founded in 2002 , has been in business for 10 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many employees are there in total in the company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: More than 2000 now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What education background do the employees usually have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: More than half of the employees have bachelors ' degree .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are there many promotion chances in the company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Three times every year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . You can go take a look .
segments.speaker: S2
